description: Try our easy to follow Kikkomans Prawn Dumplings recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Kikkomans Prawn Dumplings Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Chop spring onion and coriander and place in a bowl
Roughly chop raw prawn meat (roughly to add texture) and add to the bowl.
Add the remaining ingredients for the filling and mix well
Spoon 1.5 teaspoon of mixture onto the middle of the pastry
Wet the pastry edges with water and fold over to close and seal
Heat a tablespoon of oil in a large pan on medium-high heat
Place dumplings in the pan and lightly press the pastry on the pan to sear until evenly brown, cook until bases are browned
Add 1/2 cup of water and put the pan lid on and cook for approximately 5 minutes until water has evaporated and a sizzling sound can be heard
